comments.author: DOH!
comments.body: Hi The Team OptionBlitz!As I understand it, for the project, the team will be "anonymous" but the main sponsor can be the representative right? and will we have partnerships/sponsors on the runway? Is it already there or will it be coming? Thanks & best regards

comments.author: Optionblitz
comments.body: Quote from: DOH! on January 29, 2023, 06:37:07 AMHi The Team OptionBlitz!As I understand it, for the project, the team will be "anonymous" but the main sponsor can be the representative right? and will we have partnerships/sponsors on the runway? Is it already there or will it be coming? Thanks & best regardsWe will have partnerships and sponsors, the team is private but will be disclosed to major investors/partners and we will be running events where you can meet us in person too. If I didnt answer your question properly please let me know

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Infographic how OptionBlitz works with liquidity providers and traders connected via the trading protocol. $BLX presale is launching in just few days! Visit http://optionblitz.co/presale for more information!Affiliate marketing in #DeFi has not fully emerged yet. OptionBlitz is pushing to leverage the possibilities of web 3.0 to create a more transparent and trustworthy affiliate culture in the crypto/trading spheres. Some benefits of blockchain technology include transparent ledger + verifiable proof. Affiliates and fund managers can show the performance of their accounts honestly. No more fake demo accounts showing falsified trades.When affiliates want to claim their rewards, it all happens on the blockchain layer so managers can't be locked out or have their withdrawals blocked. By leveraging the OptionBlitz $BLX token economy we create even more incentives for affiliates to join us. If you want to become successful and generate a passive income you can use the OptionBlitz tool kit to bootstrap your own trading community with educational resources, trading signals and marketing support.
